```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#all english words
word_list <- read_csv(paste0("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dwyl",
                             "/english-words/master/words_alpha.txt"),
                           col_names = "word")
word_list <- word_list %>%
  mutate(length = str_length(word)) %>% 
  filter(length >= 4)
```

```{r}
center_letter <- "c"
circle_letters <- c("d",
                    "m",
                    "a",
                    "y",
                    "r",
                    "e")
all_letters <- c(center_letter, circle_letters)

rmvd_lets <- letters %>% subset(!letters %in% circle_letters & !letters %in% center_letter)


answers <- word_list %>%
  filter(str_detect(word, center_letter) == TRUE) %>% 
  mutate(lets = str_split(word, pattern="")) %>% 
  filter(str_detect(string=word, pattern=str_c(rmvd_lets, collapse="|")) == FALSE) %>% 
  pull(word)
```
